summary: This is an email dated July 17, 2020, regarding the shipment of a hard drive containing FBI data. The sender informs the recipient that the package will be shipped from the White Plains office and confirms the contents are from the FBI.

events.title: Scheduled delivery of FBI hard drive
events.description: The hard drive containing FBI data is scheduled to be delivered to the recipient on Monday, July 20, 2020.

keyFacts: An FBI hard drive containing data related to the US v. Epstein case was being shipped on July 17, 2020.
The shipment was arranged to be delivered on Monday, July 20, 2020.
The package's shipping information would indicate it originated from a White Plains office, but the contents were FBI data.
